content.rendered: Host Greg Smithies, a Climate Technology Investment Partner at Fifth Wall, is joined by Jason Gates, CEO of Compology. Jason explains how Compology builds waste metering technology, or smart dumpster cameras and AI, to help commercial and multifamily property owners and managers cut waste operations cost while improving recycling and reducing carbon emissions. Greg and Jason discuss how not having waste metering in place can have negative implications on a company’s supply chain and operations.
